node.title: Rugby league's biggest competitions will return to Sydney after pandemic-related hiatus.
node.alt: A player tucks the ball under her arm as she runs toward the tryline in an NRLW game.
node.description: The NRL, NRLW and State of Origin will be played in Sydney once again after their respective draws were confirmed on Tuesday.
node.content: ["The NRL has today confirmed the full fixtures for their men's and women's competitions ahead of\u00a0their upcoming\u00a0seasons, with the delayed NRLW\u00a0starting with a stand-alone triple-header in late February\u00a0before the NRL begins in early March.", "After a postponement to the women's competition earlier this year, the NRL have organised a seven-week season to take place early next year before their fifth campaign later in 2022.", "Foundation club St. George Illawarra will kick off the rescheduled season\u00a0against newcomers Gold Coast at McDonald Jones Stadium in Newcastle.", "They\u00a0will then be\u00a0followed by a grand final rematch between Brisbane Lions and the Sydney Roosters before Newcastle take on Parramatta to close out the first round.", "Games will then be shifted to WIN Stadium in Wollongong for a second round of stand-alone triple-header matches.", "The NRLW will then align its calendar with the NRL from round three, with games scheduled to be played alongside the men's competition throughout March, including double-headers.", "Similar excitement surrounds the opening rounds of the NRL season as last year's grand finalists, Penrith, take on Manly, home to Dally M winner Tom Trbojevic, in the first game on Thursday March 10 at Panthers Stadium.", "The game marks the return of the NRL to Sydney for the first time since July after the pandemic forced the 2021 season\u00a0to finish in Queensland.", "Other round one matches include the Warriors facing St. George on the Sunshine Coast, while former Rabbitohs halfback Adam Reynolds will lead Brisbane out against his old club.", "Elsewhere, the Roosters take on Newcastle, while the new Sharks boss, Craig Fitzgibbons, will open his new coaching chapter against the Raiders in Canberra.", "Finally, closing out round one will be Wests Tigers against the Melbourne Storm, who will be without suspended stars Cameron Munster and Brandon Smith, before Parramatta take on Newcastle and North Queensland play the Bulldogs.", "The league draw also comes alongside\u00a0the confirmed dates for the 2022 State of Origin series.", "Game one will take place at Stadium Australia in Sydney on June 8 before shifting cross-country to Optus Stadium in Perth for game two on June 26.", "Suncorp Stadium in Brisbane will host the third and final game on July 13."]
